website_summaries.verdict: Popular and dependable low-cost selenium supplement.
pros: Free of all common food allergens including yeast
Selenomethionine form is naturally chelated and best absorbed by body
cons: Pills have a strong odor, which selenium tends to have
this product received more complaints than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Smell Cry Babies, Get over it.
customer_reviews.text: People, Get over it. Selenium has an odor. People are giving this 1 star because of its smell. ALL SELENIUM SMELLS. To smell it you have to stick your nose into the bottle. Ok....there is an odor. So what. Do you want to take selenium or not. Some people. The bottle came quickly and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: R. Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Look out for selenium toxicity
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with selenium and watch out for side effects of toxicity... I felt fine on this supplement for the first month or so, but then the side effects began to gradually sneak up on me. Near the end of three months, I realized that the increasing nausea, bloating, gas, cramps, fatigue, irritability, and acne were all due to selenium building up in my system. I discontinued the supplement and I started feeling better within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Blubutin

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is a good price for gluten free selenium. I have hashimoto's with high reverse t3, I read this and zinc could help bring reverse t3 down so I'm giving it a whirl. Yes, it stinks a little, and sometimes I burp it up a little afterwards, so I usually take it with a flavored chewable methyl B-12 so I will not notice the smell/taste. I previously tried just brazil nuts but my blood results didn't change and I still very felt inflamed, less so on this + turmeric.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Heart recovery
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bottle and now it is time to order another. Selenium, at 200 mcg, is very safe. I started taking daily selenium 10 years ago along with other minerals. It helped pull me out of heart failure and, over time, helped normalize the size of my heart. My heart was enlarged. Hypertrophy is supposedly incurable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took these while trying to conceive.
customer_reviews.text: Started taking these in May when I started hearing how selenium helps with implantation and we conceived in June. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mo rocca

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Chemical Smell With New Bottle - no Good All Natures Way’s Products
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a big advocate of this brand until recently they decided to change their bottle. The product and I mean not only one but every supplement I purchased with their new look bottle smell like soap. A chemical smell that makes me nauseous. I am very sad because I am going to miss this brand. This new bottle seems of a low grade material compromising the quality of their product. It doesn’t pay to cut corners. Products need to improved when making changes not going back and offer something toxic that is going to be ingestive.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great value & great for ur health!
customer_reviews.text: I take 200mcg a day, nd have ever since I was diagnosed with cancer 6 yrs ago. Its proven to be anti-cancer (for lack of better term)& I will take forever!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Smelled so bad, I threw the rest away. This is the first selenium I have ever noticed a smell. I feel like it made my breath and body smell like it. I will go back to my other brand.
customer_reviews.author: 71sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Could knock a dog off a gut wagon.
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't that time of the month I'd swear I was pregnant for how nauseous this supplement makes me every time I take it. I'm talking gagging, hold your nose awful. If I can make it through this bottle I'll be switching brands to a less pungent smelling one. I thought it was me, but from the reviews it's just naturally disgusting. I'm on my 3rd day of taking it so I'll update on any changes later. I'm hypothyroid and I'm looking to get more energy. Hopefully the stomach churning supplement does something except make me almost barf up my dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Loni S. Spriggs

customer_reviews.title: Works well with lutein for eye health. As a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well with lutein for eye health. As a writer, my vision is mighty important so I'll be taking this for the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Jlynnc

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor
customer_reviews.text: The odor was so strong I threw them out without every taking one. The sealed package made the medicine cabinet smell.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was purchased as a daily dietary supplement for myself and my daughter. It's an easy to swallow pill, in capsule form. If you're looking for a simple selenium supplement, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Great antioxident.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Great antioxidant. I take this & I give this & "SOD" to my 14 year old Alaskan Malamute for hip problems. A vet recommended the two item combination. In 2-3 weeks I noticed a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jan G.

customer_reviews.title: STINKY
customer_reviews.text: These smelled HORRIBLE. It was hard to swallow them without gagging. I tried leaving the bottle open to air them out and nothing helped. I ended up taking double the amount per day to get rid of them quicker.
customer_reviews.author: GingerSnaps

customer_reviews.title: EFFECTIVE AND AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a family member who has hypothyroidism. She is using this in conjunction with zinc to help optimize her thyroid medicine. And... so far it has been effective in doing so. She is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MB.5

customer_reviews.title: Good product but bad smell
customer_reviews.text: As a hypothyroid patient selenium as one of the essential daily supplements that I take. This is the first time that I try this brand and I am really liking it I have not had any digestion Issues. The only thing that I dislike about this product is the smell of it. However everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hamadi

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great product. They do stink when you open the bottle, but knowing that you can just hold your breath until you take it. These help me tremendously with my Hashimoto’s and I feel like I have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife takes it based on a doctor's suggestion and by that doctor being satisfied with her health since starting this product I
customer_reviews.text: been using this product for a a couple of years. It is reasonably priced. My wife takes it based on a doctor's suggestion and by that doctor being satisfied with her health since starting this product I assume it's quality is consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vitamin because i have hypothyroidism and it is helping me to keep it onder control with t2 and t3 to t4
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M Tejada

customer_reviews.title: No difference felt.
customer_reviews.text: We don't feel any difference. Our skin and nails don't seem to improve whatsoever with this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Al Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I took this product following radioactive iodine treatment of my thyroid gland. Capsules are somewhat large but not too hard to swallow. I have no way of knowing the efficacy.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Mueller

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get any result
customer_reviews.text: First when I purchased it, seems like there was a result, but later I didn't feel that my migraines were better, some days I had them every day as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Helens

customer_reviews.title: One a day, price reasonable
customer_reviews.text: I was advised to start taking selenium to help prevent breast cancer. So I felt it couldn't hurt. I've only been taking it, one capsule a day for the past two weeks. I've had no adverse reaction to it. It's a capsule so it's easy to swallow with water. As in other reviews, it does smell horrible but if you don't sniff it & just swallow it you don't really notice the bad odor. The price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Donawana

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I am taking it for the joint pain and I feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett I.

customer_reviews.title: Helps thyroid function
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently taking selenium to help my thyroid convert my medication. This has been a big help

customer_reviews.title: Package not as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: It really seems to boost my energy levels and give an over all sense of good health. I plan to continue to use this ...

customer_reviews.title: Selenium

It's not bad just has an (natural) odor I feel sure. I do feel like the quality of the product is good I trust Nature's way products.

customer_reviews.title: Eat a Brazil nut!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I was looking for a supplement that was gluten and soy free. Unfortunately, these are the most horrible smelling vitamins I've ever purchased in my life. The sulfur/rotten egg smell almost knocked me over when I opened them. I'm afraid to take them for fear I'll smell just as horrendous!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni A

customer_reviews.title: good to take with iodine
customer_reviews.text: I take Lugol's daily and you are supposed to supplement with Selenium when you take iodine. But I really don't like the smell of these pills. When they run out, I may just get some Brazil nuts and eat one of those a day to get my selenium. Fact is, this is cheaper than Brazil nuts. But it may be worth it anyway as I get wimpy about taking supplements when they smell bad and that doesn't do me very much good!

customer_reviews.title: yuck!]

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and bad tasting - there are better brands!

There is an awful odor to the capsules and an accompanying flavor that takes 5-6 sips of juice to dissipate enough that I'm not gagging. I'll burp the flavor for up to 10 minutes afterwards. I will definitely be switching back to my old brand.

product_meta.title: Nature's Way Selenium 200 mcg; L-selenomethionine; 100 Capsules
product_meta.description: Nature's Way Selenium is carefully produced to superior quality standards and is naturally gluten-free. Selenium is an essential component of glutathione, the body’s most potent antioxidant system.
feature_bullets: ANTIOXIDANT: Selenium is an essential component of glutathione, the body’s most potent antioxidant system.
SUPERIOR QUALITY STANDARDS: Our Selenium 200 mcg is carefully tested and produced to superior quality standards.
GLUTEN-FREE: Nature's Way Selenium 200 mcg is gluten free and vegetarian. It also contains no sugar, salt, yeast, wheat, soy, corn, dairy products, artificial colors, flavors or preservatives.
SERVING RECOMMENDATIONS: Take 1 capsule daily, preferably with food. If pregnant, nursing or taking any medications, consult a healthcare professional before use.
